title: Quantam Computing
content: Predicting the behavior of even simple molecules with total accuracy is beyond the capabilities of the most powerful computers. This is where quantum computing offers the possibility of significant advances in the coming years.

title: Articial Intelligence in Gaming
content: Sony AI researchers used a technique called deep reinforcement learning. They rewarded the AI for certain behaviors, such as staying on the track, remaining in control of the vehicle and respecting racing etiquette.

title: Starlink
content: People usually have to be closer—within 180 to 250 miles—to get a high-quality Internet connection.
